abstract: HSBC Holdings has hired Ben Ashby, a former senior member of JPMorgan Chase’s proprietary-trading team, to act as head of European credit research, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: HSBC Holdings has hired Ben Ashby, a former senior member of JPMorgan Chase’s proprietary-trading team, to act as head of European credit research, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: HSBC Holdings has hired Ben Ashby, a former senior member of JPMorgan Chase‘s proprietary-trading team, to serve as head of European credit research, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: HSBC Said to Name Ex-JPMorgan Trader to Europe Unit
